originalText.text: Dr. Jacobowitz is the Best! He is a phenomenal Heart Surgeon. We met Dr. J back in 2011 when he performed open heart surgery on my Dad. He saved my Dad‚Äôs life. originalText.text: Dr. Jacobowitz is not only a phenomenal heart surgeon, he is a brilliant, generous, caring, and loving man. He saved my father's life many years ago. If and when I needed him, whether it was to talk to him, or to see him personally, he was ALWAYS available for me and my family. They don't come better than Dr. Jacobowitz.God bless him!!

originalText.text: Dr. Jacobowitz is a highly respected cardiothoracic surgeon. A dedicated medical doctor and a truly skilled surgeon, Dr. Jacobowitz is renowned for his wonderful bedside manner; an attribute that his countless patients will certainly confirm.  He is most appreciated for his warm and caring demeanor; a quality that surely promotes and encourages his patients‚Äô full and speedy recoveries. Our family is indebted to Dr. Jacobowitz for always being present and available when our family members were in need of his care.

originalText.text: Doctor J did my bypass surgery. I received excellent care post op and he did a great job explaining all aspects of the surgery. He is extremely professional and has great bedside manners. Initially, I was nervous about the surgery but after it was explained to me by Doctor J my concerns were put at ease. The surgery was successful with no issues in recovery.

originalText.text: I can't give enough praise to Dr Israel Jacobowitz for the excellent care he provided to my husband during his cardio thoracic surgery    His expertise and knowledge gave us much confidence in his abilities. He is passionate about his patients and takes the time to answer all of our questions pre and post surgery.  Much thanks to Dr Jacobowitz for all that you did !
